name: Bomb Carnage
description:
In Bomb Carnage, you are thrown into the role of a crazy miner, who prefers digging with bombs!

- Jump and throw bombs!
- Kill monsters!
- Look out for falling debris!
- Go as deep as you can!

We suggest to play this version on Iphone 5 and newer devices.

Controls:
Left side of the screen -> Press and hold to move
Tap jump button -> Jump
Tap and hold jump button -> Jump higher
Tap bomb button -> Throw Bomb
Tap and hold bomb button -> Drop Bomb
